description: We are looking for a passionate Software Engineer to design, develop, and install software solutions. Requirements: 3+ years of experience in software development, strong knowledge of JavaScript, React, and Node.js. This is a mid-level role requiring problem-solving skills and knowledge of modern development tools.

Seeking a Data Scientist to analyze complex data and deliver business insights. Requirements: 5+ years of experience, expertise in Python, R, and machine learning frameworks. Senior-level role; experience with big data technologies like Hadoop is a plus.

We need a creative Digital Marketing Specialist to manage our campaigns. Requirements: 2+ years of experience in social media, SEO, and PPC campaigns. Junior to mid-level role, strong knowledge of Google Analytics is essential.

We are hiring a Project Manager to oversee construction projects. Requirements: 7+ years of experience, PMP certification preferred. Senior-level role requiring leadership skills and proficiency in MS Project.

Looking for a Graphic Designer to create visual concepts. Requirements: 3+ years of experience, proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, and a strong portfolio. Mid-level role; knowledge of motion graphics is a bonus.

Join our team as a Cybersecurity Analyst to protect our systems. Requirements: 4+ years of experience, knowledge of threat modeling, SIEM tools, and cybersecurity certifications like CISSP or CEH. Mid-level role with opportunities for growth.

Seeking an experienced HR Manager to lead our HR department. Requirements: 6+ years of experience, expertise in employee relations, and knowledge of German labor laws. Senior-level role requiring excellent communication skills.

We are hiring a Financial Analyst to assess financial data and trends. Requirements: 3+ years of experience, a degree in Finance or Economics, and advanced Excel skills. Mid-level role; CFA certification is a plus.

Looking for a Mechanical Engineer to design and oversee machinery production. Requirements: 5+ years of experience, knowledge of AutoCAD and SolidWorks. Senior-level role requiring strong technical expertise.

Hiring a Content Writer to create engaging articles and blogs. Requirements: 2+ years of experience, excellent writing skills, and knowledge of SEO best practices. Junior-level role with opportunities for creativity.

Seeking an AI Research Scientist to develop innovative AI solutions. Requirements: PhD in AI or related field, 5+ years of research experience, and expertise in deep learning frameworks. Senior-level role with a focus on research and development.

Looking for a Customer Service Representative to handle customer inquiries. Requirements: 1+ year of experience in customer service, excellent communication skills, and a friendly attitude. Junior-level role with on-the-job training provided.

Hiring an experienced Electrician for residential and commercial projects. Requirements: 5+ years of experience, a valid electrician license, and knowledge of safety regulations. Mid-level role with opportunities for overtime.

Join us as a Web Developer to build responsive websites. Requirements: 3+ years of experience, expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and knowledge of WordPress. Mid-level role; familiarity with Vue.js or Angular is a bonus.
We need an Architect to design innovative buildings. Requirements: 7+ years of experience, a degree in Architecture, and proficiency in Revit and AutoCAD. Senior-level role with creative freedom.

We are looking for a UX Designer to enhance user experiences across our digital products. Requirements: 4+ years of experience in UX design, proficiency in Figma and Adobe XD, and a strong portfolio showcasing user-centered design. Mid-level role.
Hiring a Sales Manager to lead our regional sales team. Requirements: 6+ years of experience in sales, proven leadership skills, and a strong track record of meeting sales targets. Senior-level role.
Seeking a Cloud Engineer to develop and maintain cloud infrastructure. Requirements: 5+ years of experience, expertise in AWS or Azure, and knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker. Senior-level role.
We are hiring a Nurse Practitioner to provide primary healthcare services. Requirements: 5+ years of experience, a valid nursing license, and excellent patient care skills. Mid to senior-level role.
Looking for a Business Analyst to identify business needs and solutions. Requirements: 3+ years of experience, strong analytical skills, and proficiency in business process modeling. Mid-level role.
Join us as a Civil Engineer to design infrastructure projects. Requirements: 5+ years of experience, knowledge of structural analysis software, and a degree in Civil Engineering. Senior-level role.

Hiring an Operations Manager to streamline business processes. Requirements: 6+ years of experience, strong organizational skills, and expertise in logistics and supply chain management. Senior-level role.
Seeking a Product Manager to oversee product development. Requirements: 5+ years of experience, expertise in Agile methodologies, and strong communication skills. Senior-level role.
Looking for a Social Media Manager to create and manage social campaigns. Requirements: 3+ years of experience, creativity, and strong knowledge of social media platforms. Mid-level role.

We need a Machine Learning Engineer to develop AI models. Requirements: 5+ years of experience in Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Senior-level role with opportunities to work on cutting-edge AI projects.
Hiring a Legal Advisor to provide legal counsel on business matters. Requirements: 7+ years of experience, expertise in corporate law, and a valid license to practice law. Senior-level role.
Seeking an Interior Designer to create stylish interiors. Requirements: 4+ years of experience, a degree in Interior Design, and proficiency in design software. Mid-level role.
Looking for a licensed Pharmacist to manage prescriptions and advise patients. Requirements: 5+ years of experience, a Pharm.D. degree, and a valid pharmacist license. Senior-level role.
We need a Backend Developer to build scalable APIs. Requirements: 4+ years of experience in Python or Java, knowledge of SQL databases, and familiarity with cloud services. Mid-level role.

Hiring an IT Support Specialist to assist users with technical issues. Requirements: 2+ years of experience in IT support, knowledge of Windows and MacOS, and excellent troubleshooting skills. Junior to mid-level role.

We're seeking an experienced React-Native Engineer. Experienced in developing applications, good with teamwork and multitasking. Also Cloud Expertise is a plus, if he knows Docker, Redis. Experience with english language and passionate to learn. It is a Junior role, so if he is still pursuing his Bachelors degree it is perfect.

We are looking for an experienced Barista to join our team. Responsibilities include preparing coffee and other beverages, maintaining cleanliness, and providing excellent customer service. Previous experience in a café is preferred but not required.
Seeking a skilled Chef to oversee our kitchen. The role involves menu planning, food preparation, and kitchen staff management. At least 5 years of experience in a fine-dining environment required.
We need a certified Welder to join our team. The job includes welding and fabricating metal components, following safety protocols, and maintaining tools. Experience in MIG/TIG welding is a plus.
Hiring a Construction Engineer to oversee site projects, manage structural designs, and coordinate teams. A degree in Civil Engineering and 3+ years of experience required.
Looking for a Registered Nurse to provide patient care, administer medication, and coordinate with doctors. A valid nursing license and 2+ years of hospital experience are mandatory.
Seeking a Software Developer with expertise in Python and JavaScript. The role involves building web applications, maintaining databases, and collaborating with product teams. Remote work available.
We are hiring an experienced Electrician to install and maintain electrical systems in residential and commercial buildings. Must have a valid electrician’s license.
Looking for a Graphic Designer to create visually appealing designs for print and digital media. Proficiency in Adobe Suite and a strong portfolio required.
Hiring a Mechanical Engineer to design, analyze, and test automotive components. A degree in Mechanical Engineering and experience in CAD software required.
We are looking for an experienced Marketing Manager to develop and execute campaigns. The role involves brand management, digital marketing, and customer engagement. 5+ years of experience preferred.
Hiring a passionate Teacher for high school students. Responsibilities include lesson planning, student evaluation, and classroom management. A teaching certification is required.
Looking for a responsible Delivery Driver to transport packages safely and efficiently. A valid driver’s license and good driving record are necessary.
We are looking for a friendly and organized Receptionist to handle check-in/check-out processes, answer calls, and provide customer support. Previous experience in hospitality is a plus.
Seeking an experienced Auto Mechanic to diagnose and repair vehicles, perform maintenance services, and ensure high-quality workmanship. ASE certification preferred.
Hiring a skilled Plumber to install and repair piping systems, troubleshoot leaks, and ensure compliance with safety regulations. Must have a valid plumbing license.
Looking for a Warehouse Worker to manage inventory, load/unload goods, and maintain a clean workspace. Ability to lift heavy items is required.
Seeking a vigilant Security Guard to monitor premises, control access, and respond to security incidents. Previous security experience and a valid license required.
We are hiring a Sales Associate to assist customers, manage transactions, and maintain store displays. Strong communication and customer service skills are essential.
Hiring a reliable Taxi Driver to transport passengers safely and efficiently. A valid driver’s license and knowledge of city routes required.
Looking for a Farm Worker to assist with planting, harvesting, and general farm maintenance. Physical endurance and willingness to work outdoors are necessary.
Seeking a Call Center Representative to handle customer inquiries, provide solutions, and log interactions. Strong communication and problem-solving skills required.
We are looking for a certified Personal Trainer to create fitness plans, guide clients, and track progress. A certification in fitness training is required.

Join Uber as a driver and earn on your own schedule! As an independent contractor, you'll use your vehicle to provide safe and reliable rides to passengers in your city. Enjoy flexible hours, competitive earnings, and access to in-app navigation and support. Must have a valid driver’s license, a reliable vehicle, and meet local requirements. Sign up today and start driving!
